text: Hey Twitter, have you heard about the latest flu season estimates? 🤧‍♂️💨 According to CDC, the preliminary in-season burden estimates for 2023-2024 are now available! 📊👀 Each week, new estimates are provided, and they're compared to end-of-season hospitalization estimates from previous years. 🤔💡 Want to know the latest numbers? Check it out: [insert link] 💻👉 It's important to keep in mind that these estimates are preliminary and may change as new data becomes available. 🚨💥 But, it's still useful to track the progress of the flu season, don't you think? 🤔👍 Let's stay informed and take care of ourselves and others! 💕🌡️
